text:
The Employees Provident Fund Organisation, Sub-Regional Office here, will conduct ‘Nidhi Aapke Nikat’ (PF near you) for the month of February at Erode on February 10 for Employees Provident Fund members, employers and trade unions.

The meeting will be held at the district office of EPFO, Income Tax building, Gandhiji Road, Erode. A press release from C. Amudha, Regional PF Commissioner-II, issued here on Friday, said that the meeting for the subscribers will be held between 10.30 a.m. and 1 p.m.; for employers between 3 p.m. to 4 p.m. and for exempted establishments between 4 p.m. and 5 p.m.

Details of grievances if any, along with PF account No, UAN No, name of the establishment, mobile number and e-mail ID should be sent to the Public Relations officer, EPFO, SRO, Salem, on or before February 5.

They may also mail their grievances tosro.salem@epfindia.gov.in
title: TAMIL NADU
